https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/avnIpZKRHS4w2Op59cqie8ztDWd.jpg Adam is a dashing young priest who catches the eye of Eve. Adam is having trouble fighting his desires to be with his young pursuer, and before long, finds himself in a steamy affair with the woman. Homosexual dancer Jason can't hide his jealousy over the newly formed couple and begins to challenge the pair's staying power. Adam & Eve
